languages.text: "Маражай прав. Спровоцируйте его на атаку и расставьте ловушки".
"Marazhai is right. Set a series of traps and provoke it to attack."
languages.original_text: "Маражай прав. Спровоцируйте его на атаку и расставьте ловушки".

traits.locale_text: "Heinrix, contact the agents of Ordo Xenos — it is time to purge Vheabos of corruption."
"Heinrix, contact the agents of Ordo Xenos — it is time to purge Vheabos of corruption."

languages.text: “玛拉斋说得没错。设置一系列陷阱，引诱它主动出击。”
languages.original_text: "Marazhai is right. Set a series of traps and provoke it to attack."

traits.locale_text: “玛拉斋说得没错。设置一系列陷阱，引诱它主动出击。”

languages.text: «Marazhai tiene razón. Pongan una serie de trampas y provoquen su ataque».
languages.original_text: "Marazhai is right. Set a series of traps and provoke it to attack."

traits.locale_text: «Marazhai tiene razón. Pongan una serie de trampas y provoquen su ataque».

languages.text: 「マラズハイは正しい。トラップを仕掛けてやつを挑発し、攻撃させるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Marazhai is right. Set a series of traps and provoke it to attack."

traits.locale_text: 「マラズハイは正しい。トラップを仕掛けてやつを挑発し、攻撃させるんだ」

languages.text: « Marazhai a raison. Posons une série de pièges pour le forcer à attaquer. »
languages.original_text: "Marazhai is right. Set a series of traps and provoke it to attack."

traits.locale_text: « Marazhai a raison. Posons une série de pièges pour le forcer à attaquer. »

languages.text: "Marazhai hat recht. Legt mehrere Fallen aus und provoziert das Monster, anzugreifen."
languages.original_text: "Marazhai is right. Set a series of traps and provoke it to attack."

traits.locale_text: "Marazhai hat recht. Legt mehrere Fallen aus und provoziert das Monster, anzugreifen."

languages.text: "Marazhai doğru söylüyor. Birkaç tuzak kurup avı kışkırtalım."
languages.original_text: "Marazhai is right. Set a series of traps and provoke it to attack."
